attributes.action: Award Steven Gibson, the chairman of Middlesbrough Football Club a knighthood.
attributes.background:
Since Mr Gibson, was born and bred on Teesside.
Over the years, he has done many things to raise the profile of Teesside, including running a successful business, creating many jobs locally, represented Teesside across the world in many ways.
He also helped to save and support Middlesbrough fc

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
